MoviesDescription: Sam Raimi, the director of the movie overdid the horror part. The movie didn't feel like the typical light-hearted Marvel movie that I go to theaters for.

MoviesName: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
MoviesDescription: Sam Raimi, the director of the movie overdid the horror part. The movie didn't feel like the typical light-hearted Marvel movie that I go to theaters for.
Okish direction. Watched it only for Keanu Reeves.
The story telling & acting by Jared Leto & Anne Hathaway is on point. A MUST WATCH if you're interested in either well documented stories & startups.
Marvel's best multiverse movie so far as it was able to pull off the unimaginable task of brining all previous Spiderman & their counterparts in one movie. Very well executed storyline.
Loved the fact that it didn't have an all-star cast back then and still all the actors felt perfect for their roles. The action sequences were directed to feel real 100%.
